titleStmt.title: An humble remonstrance to his His Maiesty, against the tax of ship-money imposed, laying open the illegalitie, abuse, and inconvenience thereof.
titleStmt.author: Prynne, William, 1600-1669.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication suggested by Wing.
Pages 43-44 [i.e., pp. 67-68]: "A list of ships with their charge."
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
